A sermon before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor and the Right Worshipful the Aldermen of the city of London, preached on Febr. 29, 1679/80, at Guildhall-Chappel by Adam Littleton ... Littleton, Adam, 1627-1694.

Printed by S. Roycroft for Rich. Marriott, and are to be sold by Walter Kettleby ..., London : 1680.
Advertisement: p. [1] at end. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
